sentence.Network_en: The country's main port is located at the head of fjord on Norway's southern coast.
sentence.Network_cn: 挪威的主要港口,位于挪威南海岸的海湾的上游.

sentence.Network_en: An arm of the sea similar to a fjord.
sentence.Network_cn: 挪威中部一城市,濒临特隆赫姆沥海峡.

sentence.Network_en: The 20 km long shallow - bottomed fjord, Otago Harbour, is the home of an abundance of wildlife.
sentence.Network_cn: 拥有20公里长的低浅峡湾的奥塔哥港, 拥有丰富的野生动植物资源.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 主要峡湾(fjord) ：Lysefjord （吕瑟峡湾）， Sonesjord (松恩峡湾), Gudvangen fjord, Geirangerfjord 涵盖的sightseeing 路线： hiking.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: Norwegian, from Old Norse fjǫrthr. Compare with firth

entry.def: A fjord is a strip of sea that comes into the land between high cliffs, especially in Norway.

means.word_mean: 1. a long narrow inlet of the sea between steep cliffs; common in Norway

auth_sentence.content: So I bought an old hotel on the fjord of Killary.
